verses.name: Genesis 33:12
verses.text: And he said, Let us take our journey, and let us go, and I will go before thee.

verses.name: Genesis 33:13
verses.text: And he said unto him, My lord knoweth that the children are tender, and the flocks and herds with young are with me: and if men should overdrive them one day, all the flock will die.

verses.name: Genesis 33:14
verses.text: Let my lord, I pray thee, pass over before his servant: and I will lead on softly, according as the cattle that goeth before me and the children be able to endure, until I come unto my lord unto Seir.
